resources.string: Drag an image over the lower left corner to put in closet.
Use left and right arrows to browse previously viewed products.
Drag related products below to the center to see details.
Drag an image over the lower right corner to share.
Drag product to the top right corner to add to your shopping cart.
Hold down the back arrow to get back to camera scanning mode.
Please check your internet connection and try again.
